DOC.criteria: Diabetic macular edema ( central macular thickness great 300 mm optical coherence tomography ) history glaucoma ocular hypertension ( define intraocular pressure high 22 mmHg ) ocular condition ( diabetes ) , opinion investigator , might affect macular oedema alter visual acuity course study ( e.g . retinal vein occlusion , uveitis ocular inflammatory disease , neovascular glaucoma , IrvineGass Syndrome , etc . ) systemic corticosteroid therapy history thromboembolic event ( include myocardial infarction cerebral vascular accident ) major surgery within prior 6 month plan within next 28 day
